title: Foxworth Friday: Super Bowl, 'G-Funk' Halftime Show
description:
Bomani Jones and Domonique Foxworth discuss “Super Week”, including the best and worst part about going to the biggest game in the sports calendar (1:19). Plus, the guys make their pick on who they think will win (18:47), ramble about “getting recognized” in public and share their excitement for the “G-Funk” Super Bowl halftime show (36:59).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
